author: M Soundariya Preetha
text:
The National Highways wing of the State Highways Department plans to widen 31.8 km of road from Avinashi to Avinashipalayam.

Bids invited

According to an official of the department, bids have been invited for the Rs. 162.72 crore project and it is expected to be completed in two years from the date of commencement of work.

From Avinashi to Koilvazhi (20.3 km), it is a four-lane road now and there are small stretches where the road is narrow. Paved shoulder works will be taken up, damaged medians will be replaced, and the road will be widened for two metres on either side.

From Koilvazhi to Avinashipalayam (11.5 km), it is a double-lane road now. It will be widened to make it nine metres wide on either side. There is no land acquisition for this project.
title: Road from Avinashi to be widened
